nodes.text: Ony Bobissia was a Triffian who was on the planet Coruscant during the year 22 BBY. By that time, Bobissia had become a regular at the eatery Dex's Diner, and one day outside of the diner, the Triffian chatted with a Nuknog named Slyther Bushforb.

Ony Bobissia was created for the 2002 film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, where the character appears very briefly. Bobissia's digital model was a retooling of the digital model used for the character Ebe E. Endocott, who appeared in the previous film.
